CREATE VIEW gold_db_view AS
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://covid2025storage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw-data/countrywise.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) WITH (
    -- Optional: define schema for better performance
    Cases INT,
    Deaths INT
) AS [result];
